data.ques: Please rate the following on a scale of needs improvement to excellent:

questions.ques: How skilled at their jobs are the members of your team?
How professionally do the members of your team behave?
How honest with each other are the members of your team?
How well do members of your team share responsibility for tasks?
How well does your supervisor work with clients?
How efficiently are team meetings conducted?
How fairly are responsibilities shared among your team members?
How often does your team meet its deadlines?
